title: Add instructional text to Lifetime Goals dashboard cards view

requirements.text: In the first “LIFETIME GOALS” dashboard view (the view that shows the horizontal scrollable goal-category cards), display a small instructional text above the cards that reads exactly: "Organize your life: pick a goal (or add a new one) and assign it to the month you want to start crushing it!"

quotes: In the first  'LIFETIME GOALS' view (where are the cards), add a small instructional text : "Organize your life: pick a goal (or add a new one) and assign it to the month you want to start crushing it! "

acceptanceCriteria: When the app is on the initial LIFETIME GOALS dashboard (cards) view, the instructional text is visible above the cards container.
The instructional text matches the provided string exactly (including punctuation and casing).
The instructional text is visually small/subtle (e.g., muted color and smaller font) and does not break the cards layout or horizontal scrolling behavior.

constraints: Frontend changes must not modify any files under the listed immutable paths (e.g., frontend/src/components/ui, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts/x).
Do not introduce any backend changes for this UI-only text.
nonGoals: Do not change the summary view (the per-month table) content or layout.
Do not change existing goal card behaviors (editing, adding, deleting, month selection, tooltip behavior).
